metadata.title: CVE-2019-14829 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle affection 3.7 to 3.7.1, 3.6 to 3.6.5,3.5 to 3.5.7 and earlier unsupported versions where activity creationcapabilities were not correctly respected when selecting the activity touse for a course in single activity mode.

criterions.comment: moodle package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
